Spectral_Wounds.display_help: Spectral Wounds convinces the target that they have taken severe damage. The illusion is so convincing that the victim can fall from the Spectral Wounds. However, the damage is not real, and if the victim survives long enough, the illusion will fade and some of the wounds will heal. Damage: High(Illusionary), Recharge: Moderate

Blind.display_help: Painfully Blinds a single targeted foe so severely that they are rendered helpless. Blind is so bright that additional foes may also be blinded, though they will not take any damage, and attacking them will free them from the effects. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Blind.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Psionic), Foe Hold/Sleep

Mental_Blast.display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Mental_Blast.display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

Group_Invisibility.display_help: Makes you and all teammates around you Invisible. While Invisible, you and your teammates are almost impossible to detect. Even if discovered, Group Invisibility grants a bonus to your Defense to all attacks, although you will lose some of your defense bonus if you attack. Group Invisibility has no movement penalty. Recharge: Slow
Group_Invisibility.display_target_help: You have been made Invisible and are difficult to detect. Your Defense is increased as a result.

Sonic_Siphon.display_help: By setting up a constant vibration within the body of your foe, you weaken their Damage Resistance. Affected targets will take more damage from successful attacks. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Siphon.display_target_help: Your Resistances have been weakened by the Sonic attack.
Sonic_Siphon.display_victim_hit: Your resistance to damage has been reduced by the {PowerName} of {PlayerSource}.

Sonic_Dispersion.display_help: You create a large field of sonic waves, protecting all allies inside. The Sonic Dispersion gives all allies within increased Resistance against all damage except Psionic. The Sonic Bubble also protects allies from Immobilization, Disorient, and Hold effects. Recharge: Slow
Sonic_Dispersion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Ally +Res(All Damage except Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_help: The Sonic Bubble is granting you Resistance to all types of damage as well as Hold, Immobilize and Disorienting effects.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_target_short_help: +Res(All Damage but Psionic, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient)
Sonic_Dispersion.display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from most damage types with your {PowerName}.
Sonic_Dispersion.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with {PowerName}.

Thunder_Kick.display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Storm Kick has a greater then average change to score a critical hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

Shuriken.display_help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals moderate smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Crippling_Axe_Kick.display_target_help: The Crippling Axe Kick has crippled you. You are immobilized and your Running speed will be reduced once you can move again.

High_Pain_Tolerance.display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Fast_Healing.display_help: You heal Hit Points at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Quick_Recovery.display_help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Force_Smash.display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.
Force_Smash.display_target_help: The force of the DUST soldier's smash has left you stunned.

Plasma_Burst.display_help: The DUST primary weapon charges up a powerful burst of plasma. The extreme heat of this attack gives it the potential to set you on fire. The burst of toxic chemicals may also reduce your regeneration.
Plasma_Burst.display_target_help: Plasma Burst has a chance to set you on fire and reduce your regeneration.

Force_Smash.display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.
Force_Smash.display_target_help: The force of the DUST soldier's smash has left you stunned.

Plasma_Burst.display_help: The DUST primary weapon charges up a powerful burst of plasma. The extreme heat of this attack gives it the potential to set you on fire. The burst of toxic chemicals may also reduce your regeneration.
Plasma_Burst.display_target_help: Plasma Burst has a chance to set you on fire and reduce your regeneration.

Toxic_Burst.display_help: The DUST primary weapon can have its ignition system switched off, allowing the soldier to fire the fuel as a projectile. This projectile bursts in a small area around the target, dealing toxic damage to all those in the vicinity. The volatile chemicals evaporate quickly, causing continuous toxic damage, as well as regeneration reduction and possible Endurance drain.
Toxic_Burst.display_target_help: You are being choked by noxious fumes, which also reduces your regeneration rate and may cause Endurance drain.

Shockwave_Grenade.display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. Their secondary fire mode allows them to lob a highly damaging Shockwave Grenade at their target. This causes bleed damage over time and can knock their target from its feet.
Shockwave_Grenade.display_target_help: You are bleeding due to the grenade's shrapnel!

Toxic_Burst.display_help: The DUST primary weapon can have its ignition system switched off, allowing the soldier to fire the fuel as a projectile. This projectile bursts in a small area around the target, dealing toxic damage to all those in the vicinity. The volatile chemicals evaporate quickly, causing continuous toxic damage, as well as regeneration reduction and possible Endurance drain.
Toxic_Burst.display_target_help: You are being choked by noxious fumes, which also reduces your regeneration rate and may cause Endurance drain.

Shockwave_Grenade.display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. Their secondary fire mode allows them to lob a highly damaging Shockwave Grenade at their target. This causes bleed damage over time and can knock their target from its feet.
Shockwave_Grenade.display_target_help: You are bleeding due to the grenade's shrapnel!

Force_Punch.display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.
Force_Punch.display_target_help: The force of the DUST soldier's punch has left you stunned.

Plasma_Stream.display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. The default firing mode allows the DUST Ranger to use their weapon as a high efficiency flamethrower, launching exceptionally charged plasma streams at a target. This causes damage over time and reduces regeneration rates of affected targets.
Plasma_Stream.display_target_help: Your regeneration rate has been reduced!

Force_Punch.display_help: DUST Rangers are equipped with powered armor that allows them to easily carry their special plasma cannon. This also increases the strength of their melee blows, making a melee attack from a DUST member a serious threat.
Force_Punch.display_target_help: The force of the DUST soldier's punch has left you stunned.

Plasma_Stream.display_help: DUST forces are equipped with a variable fire plasma projection weapon. The default firing mode allows the DUST Ranger to use their weapon as a high efficiency flamethrower, launching exceptionally charged plasma streams at a target. This causes damage over time and reduces regeneration rates of affected targets.
Plasma_Stream.display_target_help: Your regeneration rate has been reduced!

Damage_MN.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Damage_MN.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Damage_LT.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Damage_LT.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Damage_BS.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Damage_BS.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Sonic_Blast.display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sonic_Blast.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Tactical_Appraisal.display_help: The Monitor Sphere is capable of quickly analyzing nearby targets and locating weaknesses. This data is then quickly passed off to Praetorian Police Officers in the nearby area increasing their chance to hit.
Tactical_Appraisal.display_target_help: Your chance to hit and Perception is improved..

Call_Reinforcements.display_help: Monitor Spheres are capable of summoning reinforcements from the TEST department who are ready to be dispatched at a moment's notice.
Call_Reinforcements.display_target_help: Monitor Spheres are capable of summoning reinforcements from the TEST department who are ready to be dispatched at a moment's notice.

Resistance.display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Force_Netting.display_help: A PPD Enforcer is capable of entangling their targets in a "mostly harmless" force netting that causes minor damage over time as well as slowing the target.
Force_Netting.display_target_help: You have been slowed by the Force Netting.

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.
This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Bolts.display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolts.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Blast.display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Blast.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Cage.display_help: PPD Investigators are capable of binding their target within a fragile Force Cage, it is capable of putting its target to sleep for a short time. However any damage dealt to the target will break the effect.
Force_Cage.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Force Cage.

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Bolts.display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolts.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Blast.display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Blast.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Impact_Bomb.display_help: The Investigator charges up their force gauntlet to unleash a devastating Impact Bomb which deals moderate energy and smashing damage to all enemies within 15 feet of its initial target. Targets struck by this power may be knocked down or stunned.
Impact_Bomb.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Damage Moderate (Smash/Energy) Foe Knockdown, Disorient

Force_Netting.display_help: A PPD Enforcer is capable of entangling their targets in a "mostly harmless" force netting that causes minor damage over time as well as slowing the target.
Force_Netting.display_target_help: You have been slowed by the Force Netting.

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Shockwave.display_help: This quick blast of force gauntlet energy deals very little damage, but has a very high change to stun its targets.

Resistance.display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Resistance.display_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Force_Wave.display_help: The PPD Sergeant is capable of firing a charged up blast of force energy in a short cone in front of him causing minor energy and smashing damage as well as knocking down its targets.
Force_Wave.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Burst.

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Blast.display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Blast.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Burst.display_help: The PPD Suppressor is capable of firing a charged up blast of force energy in a short cone in front of him causing minor energy and smashing damage as well as knocking down its targets.
Force_Burst.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Burst.

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Bolts.display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Bolts.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Bolts.display_help: Force Bolts fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Force_Brawl.display_help: This quick punch delivered by the Enforcer's force gauntlet deals little damage, but has a chance to stun its target.

Force_Blast.display_help: Force Blast fires a series of bursts of force energy at their target causing moderate energy and smashing damage as has a small chance to knock its target down. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Force_Blast.display_target_help: You've been knocked down by the Force Bolts.

Force_Cage.display_help: Warrant Officers are capable of binding their target within a fragile Force Cage, it is capable of putting its target to sleep for a short time. However any damage dealt to the target will break the effect.
Force_Cage.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Force Cage.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Short_Circuit.display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.display_target_help: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: Tesla Cage confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. The target is drained of some Endurance and some of that Endurance may be transferred back to you. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: The Tesla Cage is holding you helpless.

Voltaic_Sentinel.display_help: You can manifest a polarized electricity field that hovers above the ground and hurls bolts of electricity at nearby foes. Any enemy that passes near this Sentinel risks serious injury. The Sentinel is not alive and cannot be targeted or attacked by enemies. The Sentinel can fly and will follow you. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long
Voltaic_Sentinel.display_short_help: Summon Sentinel: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe -End

Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Power.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Siphon_Speed.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.

Speed_Boost.display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Speed_Boost.display_target_help: You've been granted a Speed Boost. Your Attack speed, Endurance recovery and Running speed are all increased and you are resistant to Slow effects.
Speed_Boost.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} {PlayerDest}, greatly increasing their movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery!
Speed_Boost.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} improves your movement rate, attack rate and endurance recovery with an extra {PowerName}!

Charged_Bolts.display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Lightning_Bolt.display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: The Ball Lightning is continuing to electrocute you.

Short_Circuit.display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Short_Circuit.display_target_help: The Short Circuit is continuing to electrocute you. Your Endurance recovery is greatly reduced.

Transfusion.display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate
Transfusion.display_target_help: Your Regeneration rate has been reduced.

Siphon_Power.display_help: You can Siphon the Power from a targeted foe, reducing their damage potential. The power is transferred back to you, increasing your own damage potential and that of all nearby allies. Recharge: Slow
Siphon_Power.display_target_help: Your damage potential has been reduced.
Siphon_Power.display_attacker_hit: You reduced the damage potential of {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} to increase your own!
Siphon_Power.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} reduces your damage potential with {PowerName} to increase their own!

Siphon_Speed.display_help: You can Siphon the speed from a targeted foe, Slowing their movement and attack rate while boosting your own. Recharge: Long
Siphon_Speed.display_target_help: Your Running Speed potential has been altered. If this is a friendly power, your Running Speed is increased. If you were attacked with this power, though, your Running Speed is reduced.

Barb_Swipe.display_help: Shred your opponent with several quick Swipes from your Spines. Barb Swipe deals minor damage over time. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Lunge.display_help: You can lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large Spine on your arm. Lunge deals moderate damage. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Lunge.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You can fling dozens of Spines in all directions. These Spines only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Spine poison deals additional Toxic damage and Slows affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Charged_Armor.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Charged_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing, lethal and energy damage.

Lightning_Field.display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Lightning Field.

Conductive_Shield.display_help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a Conductive Shield that will conduct many sorts of energy away from your body. Conductive Shield grants high resistant to Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as good resistance to Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Conductive_Shield.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to fire, cold, energy, and negative energy damage.

Electric_Fence.display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized by the Electric Fence.

Scorch.display_help: This power engulfs your hands in flames, and can ignite the target of your Scorching attack. Once on fire, the target will suffer damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Fire_Blast.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Fire_Blast.display_target_help: You are on fire and burning!

Cremate.display_help: A slow but devastating attack. Cremate clobbers your foes with a massive 2 handed fiery smash that leaves your foe set on fire. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Deflection.display_help: Your mastery of the shield allows you to easily deflect melee attacks, and attacks that do get through your ironclad defenses tend to do less damage. While Deflection is active the user will gain defense to melee attacks and some minor resistance to lethal and smashing damage. Recharge: Fast
Deflection.display_attacker_hit: You engage {PowerName} increasing your melee defense as well as your lethal and smashing resistance.

True_Grit.display_help: Your intense training has left you tougher than even the hardiest of heroes. You gain additional hit points and resistance to fire, cold, energy, negative energy and toxic damage sources. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
True_Grit.display_short_help: Auto: Self +Res (Cold, Energy, Fire, Negative Energy, Toxic), +MaxHealth

Against_All_Odds.display_help: The harder pressed you are in combat the greater your offensive abilities become. Each enemy that stands toe-to-toe with you in combat will grant you a damage bonus. The first foe you engage in melee grants the highest damage bonus, and up to 10 foes can contribute to this effect. Each foe in melee range also suffers from reduced damage as your shield deflects a portion of their damage. Recharge: Slow
Against_All_Odds.display_attacker_hit: You are ready for the worst, you gain a damage bonus for each foe you engage in melee.

Force_Smasher.display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
Force_Smasher.display_target_help: The Plasma Glove attack has left you disoriented.

Force_Vortex.display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
Force_Vortex.display_target_help: The Plasma Glove attack has left you disoriented.

Resistance.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Plasma_Burst.display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
Plasma_Burst.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockdown, -Regen
Plasma_Burst.display_target_help: The Plasma Glove attack has left your regeneration rate reduced.

Resistance.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Call_Reinforcements.display_help: Lieutenants are capable of calling for backup from the TEST department who send a Monitor Sphere to determine if additional aid is needed.
Call_Reinforcements.display_target_help: Lieutenants are capable of calling for backup from the TEST department who send a Monitor Sphere to determine if additional aid is needed.

Force_Brawl.display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from the Force Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
Force_Brawl.display_target_help: The Plasma Glove attack has left you disoriented.

Plasma_Blast.display_help: TEST Rangers are equipped with upgraded versions of the Force Glove which are capable of firing beams of plasma. Ranged attacks from these Plasma Gloves have the added benefit of also reducing their target's regeneration rate.
Plasma_Blast.display_target_help: The Plasma Glove attack has left your regeneration rate reduced.

Resistance.display_help: TEST Body Armor grants the wearer some minor resistance to all forms of damage.
Resistance.display_target_help: Praetorian Police Body Armor grants them some moderate resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Energy attacks.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Explosive_Blast.display_help: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Explosive_Blast.display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Personal Force Field is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Personal Force Field will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through. The Personal Force Field works both ways; while it is active, you can only use powers that affect yourself. Cannot be used with Rest. Recharge: Slow
Personal_Force_Field.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks, but you can only cast powers on yourself while the Force Field is active.

Force_Bolt.display_help: Discharges a bolt of force that knocks down foes and deals some Smashing Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Jab.display_help: A quick jab that deals minor damage, but has a chance of Disorienting the target, especially if coupled with other attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

Punch.display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off their feet, unable to attack again until they stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Hurl.display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack deals high damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hurl.display_target_help: You have been hit by a piece of concrete and cannot fly.

Foot_Stomp.display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee attacks while you have Focused Fighting activated. This will increase your Defense versus melee as long as it is active. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and DeBuffs to Defense. Recharge: Fast
Focused_Fighting.display_attacker_hit: You Focus your Fighting ability and can now easily avoid melee attacks.

Focused_Senses.display_help: You become more evasive against ranged attacks while you have Focused Senses activated. This will increase your Defense versus ranged attacks as long as it is active. Your Improved Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes as well as resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Focused_Senses.display_attacker_hit: You Focus your Senses and can now easily avoid ranged attacks.

Evasion.display_help: You are Evasive against area effect and cone shaped attacks. This power increases your Defense versus such attacks as long as it is active. Evasion also helps you resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Evasion.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Evasive and can more easily Evade area of effect and cone attacks.

Kinetic_Shield.display_help: Kinetic Shield creates a harmonic Energy Aura that can deflect physical attacks. Your Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. Kinetic Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. The Energy based nature of Kinetic Shield also offers some minimal Defense to Energy attacks. Recharge: Fast
Kinetic_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smashing, Lethal, Energy), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Kinetic_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Kinetic Shield increased you Defense to Lethal, Smashing, and to some degree, Energy attacks.

Dampening_Field.display_help: Your body resonates a mild Dampening Field that absorbs kinetic energy from physical weapons. This auto power permanently reduces all incoming Smashing and Lethal damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Power_Shield.display_help: This Power Shield creates a Electro-Magnetic shield around you that can deflect non-physical attacks. Your Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks is increased as these attacks are reflected or refracted off the shield. Power Shield also grants you good resistance to Defense Debuffs. Recharge: Fast
Power_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +DEF(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Res(DeBuff DEF)
Power_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You Power Shield increased you Defense to Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy attacks.

Energy_Protection.display_help: Your ability to channel energy makes you naturally resistant to Energy, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Quick_Strike.display_help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Body_Blow.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Quick Strike. Body Blow is capable of stunning an opponent occasionally. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Repulsing_Torrent.display_help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
